Texts.Chs: 某人对于一根法杖的描述，或许这只是恶作剧。
Texts.Eng: A rather droll text all about one particular staff. It's quite ridiculous.

Texts.Chs: [第854页] - 然后我终于用一本远古之书，两根密文魔杖和一个远古神器把它组装起来了。我的敌人惊恐万分，因为我手中的法杖强大得不能说话。我有点饿，爆米花？似乎是合适的...
Texts.Eng: [page 854] - And then it was that I at long last assembled it from the Elder Tome, 2 Rune Wand and Elder Artifact. My enemies shook in terror, for the staff I held was capable of might untold! I was invincible! And hungry. Popcorn? Yes. That seemed a reasonable...
